title: Sword Master

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Night one, you will spend all the night building a wooden sword.
-At any night, you may decide to upgrade your sword, from wooden to iron to fiery.
-Attack someone with your sword.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Upgrading takes one day.
-A wood sword deals a Basic Attack.
-An iron sword deals a Powerful Attack.
-A fiery sword deals an Unstoppable Attack.
-When the PMCS begins, your sword Is instantly upgraded to fiery and you will now rampage.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You spent the whole night building your sword."
"You have received your wood sword!"
"You decided to upgrade your sword from wood/iron to iron/fiery."
"Your sword was upgraded to iron/fiery!"
"You decided to attack your target with your sword tonight."
"You were cut to pieces by the Sword Master!"
"...they were cut to pieces by the Sword Master."
"The Pale Moon Circus Show has begun. Put those Sharp swords to good use."

desc:
Post 117
*5 seconds later, your body is sliced to pieces.*
